transcript:
Customer: Main keha agar Truecaller toh mere ko chahiye rehta hai ki agar main download karunga phir woh ho jaega?
Executive: Haan ji sir, yeh jo aapka ho raha tha na Truecaller ne aapka call block kar diya tha.
Customer: Toh abhi dobara call download kar lu usko Truecaller?
Executive: And kahin sir phir se na ho jaaye issue. Ek baar aap ya phir kariye dekhiye yeh toh pata chal gaya na ki reason Truecaller tha sir. Isiliye yeh dikkat ho rahi thi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Woh bhai sahab ne phone lagaya tha unko phone aa gaya IndiaMART se.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai. Kahin aur aur kar diya tha unhone. Woh number dusra daal diya na sir?
Executive: Haan ji. Chaliye theek hai sir, yeh concern toh band kar dete hain kyunki Truecaller wala reason tha na. Matlab koi technical reason nahi tha alag se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapka concern tab us din se open tha. Haan, aap mere hi number pe ab call kijiyega koi issue ho toh.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Customer: Abhi mera woh hai aapne catalog update kiya?
Executive: Haan ji sir, thoda sa aap bhi support kijiye. Dekhiye call ka toh issue aa raha tha. Toh call wala ab aayega aapko koi issue nahi hoga. Baki catalog ka kaam main kar de rahi hu. Jo bhi hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai sir, baki feedback aayega abhi mere liye aapke paas mail pe. Yeh jo ticket khula tha uske liye. Toh us pe aap de dijiyega feedback.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was facing call blocking issue.

- Customer asks about catalog update.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed Truecaller was blocking calls.

- Executive assured catalog update is in progress.

- Executive asked to call on her number for issues.

- Executive asked for feedback on the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- truecaller, call blocking, catalog, feedback
